Condor

wrote:
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> He knew they were right. He had to be strong. They were faceing

evil Prime.
> Rodimus gets back to his feet.
> Rodimus Prime: I just recieved a comm message from Ultra Magnus. A

Optimus Prime in an evil form. He has already taken over Cybertron, 
and he is comeing here...
